albums.name: Edinburgh 2024
albums.description: In November 2024 I travelled up to Edinburgh to take part in an assessment center during my graduate job hunt. As the train journey up to Scotland was so long (around 7 hours), I decided to stay for a couple of nights to explore the city. I visited Dean Village, Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile, Dalton Hill, and had a wander around the city center.

albums.name: Lisbon 2024
albums.description: During the summer of 2024 I went on a family holiday to Portugal, staying a Set√∫bal. We travelled up to Lisbon a couple of times which is where most of these photos were taken.

albums.name: Abergavenny 2024
albums.description: I took a short family trip from Cardiff to Abergavenny, where we hiked up the Sugar Loaf.

albums.name: Columbia 2023
albums.description: In summer 2023 I travelled across Colombia with my family. We started in Bogota and took a coach to San Gil, Dibulla, and Cartagena.
